website_summaries.verdict: Has many features, and readings are exceptionally accurate. Just make sure to remove the forehead scan cap before using as an ear thermometer.
pros: Dual use ear and forehead scan gives you options if child has an ear infection
LCD screen with red or green backlight warning to indicate fever
Features sound alarm to indicate fever
cons: Some reviews state you must add .5 degrees to the temperature reading in forehead mode
Not a lot of instructions, and this can result in confusion because scan cap must be removed to use as an ear thermometer

customer_reviews.title: Ear mode is the best
customer_reviews.text: I love the ear thermometer in this, but the forehead seems inaccurate. I tested it against a trusted under-the-tongue thermometer, and my results were as follows: Head 96.7 F Ear 97.9 F Under tongue 98.0 So I plan to use mainly the ear mode for this thermometer. I will use the forehead for times like needing to check the temperature of a sleeping child and just keep in mind that I should add 1-1.5 degrees to the reading. The instant-read is amazing! Gone are the days of having to hold my children still for a minute or longer to check temperatures. Thanks AccuMD!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Save you money!
customer_reviews.text: Save your money. Product does not work. Purchased after last flu season because it had good reviews. My wife and I both got the flu this flu season and started using this product while very sick. Bad time to learn the temperature readings from this product are inaccurate by both forehead and ear measurements (sometimes by 2-3 degrees or more) when you are actually burning up with fever. I would hate to rely on this product for a sick child. Had to go back to regular oral thermometer so we could track our fevers. Waste of $44 (no wonder it has since dropped to $30).
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: This Thermometer does work and it is super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This Thermometer does work and it is super easy to use. You can use both in your forehead and ear mode. . For forehead mode, you leave the large cap on, place it on your forehead and press head. Simple as that. It beeps once and turns green if your temp is within normal range. It beeps multiple times and turns red if you are running a fever. For ear mode you take the large cap off, place the nossle into your ear and press ear. Again with the same colors and beeping.
customer_reviews.author: timila

customer_reviews.title: Easiest to use
customer_reviews.text: I love this thermometer. The easiest instructions ever. You simply take it out of the box remove the plastic tab over the batteries and press temple for a temple reading remove the guard and press ear for a ear reading. The duality of the product is what I love the most. A ear reading is slightly more accurate but if your child has an ear infection that won't work. Who wants to take that temperature teh old fashion way. Not I. Instead of having two different thermometers this one will handle both. Added bonus the reading takes two seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Q. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: This is quite a wonderful thermometer! It has a very large range so it can be used for other things as well, such as checking the temperature of bath water. The "head" setting works much better for me than the "ear" setting. On the ear setting you have to align it in the ear canal properly which could mean pulling on the ear.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Works well enough
customer_reviews.text: I got to test this immediately as I got Strep the week after I received it. The ear is definitely more accurate than the head. I end up taking 4 temps, 2head, followed by 2 ear. I was running a temp of 100.2 in both ears, and the head temp was 99.6. Close. The neat thing is the beep alert and light change when a temp is detected. This only occurs when the temp is 100.0+ For some reason the battery door keeps sliding off. Not completely annoying but I'm getting there.
customer_reviews.author: twinboyandgirl

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use makes this a great product
customer_reviews.text: All my digital thermometers seem to always read incorrectly, so I purchased this one with high expectations. The ease of use makes it great. There aren't 20 buttons to remember what they all do. There are 2 buttons, forehead & ear. You push the corresponding button of where you want to take the temperature. Even my 3 year old grandson can sit still long enough to have his temp checked. He wasn't too fond of the other methods. There is much less arguing with a 3 year old now, which makes me even happier. I totally recommend this thermometer for everyone that has kids in their house, you will thank me later. But is great for adults as well.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Sosebee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: So my favorite thing about this thermometer is how I can use it for both the ears and their forehead. When I first received the thermometer, I immediately checked each child's ear and head temperature. The variation in degrees was either by .1 or 1 degree. I would call that accurate. My old instant read thermometer required you to slide the thermometer across their foreheads. This one requires you to just place it on the middle. I also like how it came with 2 batteries and you had to pull the green tab in order to use it. That way you know that while your thermometer is either in shipment, or at the warehouse, the batteries are not being drained.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great thermometer!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thermometer! The display shows your temperature instantly. You can use it on your forehead or pop off the cover and it converts to a thermometer to check your temp in your ear. I love that you can take a child's temperature easily while they are asleep without disturbing them. I haven't had a fever yet since getting the thermometer, but it says it will give a distinctive beep if a person has a fever of 99.5 or above. That is great. I highly recommend this thermometer!
customer_reviews.author: PA

customer_reviews.title: Wasted Money, Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Hasn't read temperature correctly from beginning. Read temperature at 95° or less from the beginning. Placed in bag and in drawer. Took out to check children and self due to Covid-19. Need now more than before and can't use.
customer_reviews.author: Romara

customer_reviews.title: Super easy
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer is super easy to use. Comes in a nice bag. It even came with batteries ehich surprised me. So i used it right out of the box. Its very very easy to use. Seriously, a push of a button. I tested this put on my daughter, myself and husband. I feel like i got very accurate reading on both forehead or ear. All you do to swotch between the two is pull of a little cap it allows it to then fit in your ear. It is super quick too.
customer_reviews.author: Mrswilson0511

customer_reviews.title: amazing product! This thermometer allows me to take accurate ...
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars, amazing product! This thermometer allows me to take accurate temperatures in seconds with the tap of a button. Any mother knows that trying to take the temperature of a sick child is a nightmare, it is difficult to get the child to stay still long enough for an accurate reading. With this thermometer you can measure temperature by simply holding up to the forehead or inserting in to the ear. The only thing you would need aside from this purchase is a pack of ear probe covers. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: RoxanneR

customer_reviews.title: easy to read instruction manual and drawstring bag
customer_reviews.text: I should have ordered this years ago! It gives an almost instant reading. Gone will be the days of my son telling me he has a fever after running the thermometer under warm water - LOL. Came with a very detailed, easy to read instruction manual and drawstring bag. Love the extras, such as being able to look at past temperatures! One of the best purchases I've made!
customer_reviews.author: Dolly May

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: This AccuMD infrared thermometer is the best I've ever had. Its so much more convenient than the regular under the tongue thermometers. My children always bit them when I tried to use them, but with this I don't even have to disturb them even if they're asleep. It's very easy to use I'm going to start getting these for baby shower gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmeka Neal

customer_reviews.title: Good thermometer. Yesterday when it arrived I tested it ...
customer_reviews.text: Good thermometer. Yesterday when it arrived I tested it out with my oral and tympanic (ear) thermometer. All very close in temp, that tells me it’s accurate. I wanted this one because babies/kids don’t always let you stick things in their ears... I’m happy with this nice, easy to read thermometer
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Halverson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful thermometer highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: It takes a little bit to get the hang of. I'm used to those old glass thermometers with a Mercury in them. But once you get the hang of it it's so much easier to use definitely a read the instructions on the box.
customer_reviews.author: Love Firefly

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made ear thermometer with many fake reviews.
customer_reviews.text: This ear thermometer has great reviews and I have no idea why. It gave me three different readings on three tries and they were way off. And it came with little to know instructions for use and is not well made. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Blevins

customer_reviews.title: This Thermometer is great! It is so simple to use
customer_reviews.text: This Thermometer is great! It is so simple to use. It get the temperature fast whether you use the forehead function or the ear. It is nice to have two options depending on who and what age you need it for. It was shipped to be quickly and in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great thermometer. The forehead cap comes off to reveal ...
customer_reviews.text: Great thermometer. The forehead cap comes off to reveal the otic (ear) piece. Very easy to use, and easy to clean. It comes with a carrying pouch and 2 AAA batteries. Great digital screen. I would definitely recommend this to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Tray Bay

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I got a bad unit, but it did not measure temperature accurately. When I had a fever of 100 F, this thermometer read 97 F in both head and ear modes. The features are nice, but it failed to perform it's main function correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Jim S

customer_reviews.title: Best one
customer_reviews.text: The best ear and head thermometer I have bought. It is really quick, like it says one second. Very handy and easy, specially witg babies. It is almost 100% accurate as I checked it with Mercury style thermometer that I use. It comes with a nice string bag, which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Tshah

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate Readings
customer_reviews.text: Needed some easy to use for my patients and I wanted to like it but it kept giving me inaccurate readings. Temperatures would vary after retaking them seconds apart.
customer_reviews.author: ebone johnson

customer_reviews.title: Nice, compact design
customer_reviews.text: Nice, compact design and has a storage bag. We seem more to go through thermometers for some reason. I like the forehead/ear options. It's very accurate. I was pleased that batteries were included.
customer_reviews.author: Gemma

customer_reviews.title: it is definitely gr8 for the price... ...
customer_reviews.text: it is definitely gr8 for the price....fast delivery and gr8 product...i m a person who checks 1000 places and many reviews before buying anything, so yes this is definitely gr8..thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived and have to say it doesn’t work at all for the forehead on me or my toddler - this after testing and testing and reading the directions. I have zero confidence the temp reading is accurate
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Mom must have!
customer_reviews.text: Broke my thermometer so was super excited to find a good deal on this one. I love that it has the option to use your ear or head. It's 1 click and done and comes in a great pouch for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Very innacurate... while taking temperature with a ...
customer_reviews.text: Very innacurate...while taking temperature with a rectal thermometer was showing 103 F this piece of junk was showing 97...dangerous device specially for babies...can missled temperature...be careful!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Trusted review

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I would highly recommend purchasing this thermometer if you have young children. It's fast and accurate. The instructions are also very easy to understand as well as the set up.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn Donaldson Matthews

customer_reviews.title: This never seemed to give us accurate readings (when compared ...
customer_reviews.text: This never seemed to give us accurate readings (when compared to other thermometers) and stopped working completely after a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Meg Ferris

customer_reviews.title: Travel thermometer
customer_reviews.text: I needed a travel thermometer and this one fits the bill. Its easy to use and comes in a little bag that is perfect for travelling. I havent used it yet, so dont know how well it works.
customer_reviews.author: T.rabs82

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate-don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Used four times in a row- gave four different readings. Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Joan B.

customer_reviews.title: Love the convenience of this thermometer and the feel in ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the convenience of this thermometer and the feel in my hand. It's super easy to use and easy to sanitize if needed. Love it and think it's a necessity in any household
customer_reviews.author: Nina Rafiq

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work!!
customer_reviews.text: This is terrible!!! I get a different read every time I use it. Don't waste your money!!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Dashnaw

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t accurate ate all. Gave 3 different random readings right in a row.
customer_reviews.author: Jill J.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Not accurate at all. How could my temp be 90 degrees all the time on my forehead. And then it's a different reading per ear and not accurate again. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Came in a timely manner. Was exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Good price. Hopefully we will never need it
customer_reviews.text: Neat product. Good price. Hopefully we will never need it. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use. Takes a second and the temp is illuminated in the box. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price too
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time and works as expected (forehead readings are slightly different from ear readings). Good price too!. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Lawan A

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This one didn't work that good for me but could of just got a bad one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use and seems accurate. Much easier and faster than oral thermometers.
customer_reviews.author: Laneyace

customer_reviews.title: awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I have an 18 month old and this is by far the easiest way to take his temperature and get an accurate reading. I like that it has both a forehead and an ear option. I found the ear option to be the most accurate. I would recommend this thermometer if you have small children, it really makes a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca R. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Crack in screen
customer_reviews.text: There is a crack in the display. I'm very disappointed that it arrived this way. The box was not damaged so it must have been packaged that way at the factory.
customer_reviews.author: JRast

customer_reviews.title: a good addition to my medical devices
customer_reviews.text: It worked as advertised.....no surprises....a good addition to my medical devices.
customer_reviews.author: Prasenjit Bardhan

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't disturb 'em when they're sleeping
customer_reviews.text: With a very ill person, it's very easy to get accurate temperature and not disturb person. Thank you very much!!!
customer_reviews.author: BUBBIE

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: So far it is working okay. Have only used it about 6 times
customer_reviews.author: T. Giddings

customer_reviews.title: Must have for parents!
customer_reviews.text: The moment I touched this, I knew the quality would be high quality, which is important to me as a parent to three kids. I love that this is super simple to use, and it allows me to take their temperature without bothering them by trying to stick something under their tongue or armpits. It is so user friendly! I also love how fast it takes an accurate temperature, no more waiting forever and hoping that the kiddo didn't push the thermometer out of their armpit or from under their tongue to mess up the reading of the temperature. I also love that the backlight changes colors according to the temperature. No more wondering if it's high or low!
customer_reviews.author: Kendall Soto

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if you have small children who don't want to ...
customer_reviews.text: Finally decided to purchase a "good" thermometer and wow, what a difference. This infrared thermometer takes literally a second to come up with an accurate reading. Just a touch to the forehead or in the ear. Gone are the days of waiting 2 minutes and wondering if you have an accurate reading. Perfect if you have small children who don't want to sit still while you're taking their temp. I didn't have a fever (knock on wood) when I received this, but I do know my normal temp and this came in very accurate. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: D. A. Norton

customer_reviews.title: Wildly inaccurate!
customer_reviews.text: Wildly inaccurate! I read the reviews and had high hopes but this was never even close to accurate. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Corey K. Williams

customer_reviews.title: The end acts like a cap so it covers the ear part and ...
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer is really neat because you can take your temperature on the forehead or ear. The end acts like a cap so it covers the ear part and is protected. I also love how quick this is. I have another infrared thermometer and it takes over 5 seconds to do a forehead reading. That doesnt work so well on a toddler. You press the head button and a second later you have a reading. It's awesome! The reading for the forehead and the ear come out to be different each time. I mostly go with the ear readings - they seem to be more accurate.
customer_reviews.author: wavrida

customer_reviews.title: Fast and accurate!
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have in the medicine cabinet! The one thing that I love about this thermometer is how quick it is. I have noticed less accurate readings from the forehead as opposed to the ear. Since it's so quick, the kids don't mind it in their ears and it works great! The directions say to use in your forehead but we had better results on the temple.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use. Got to me quick, pulled the plastic piece and it worked right away. Easy to use on the forehead and inside the ear. I prefer inside the ear I think it's a bit more accurate but that's just my personal opinion. Small design, fits perfect in my medicine cabinet, which doesn't have much space as it is, lol. And it comes with a nice grey bag to keep it in and it keeps it clean. I like it a lot. A lot easier than general thermometers. I am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Hendershot

customer_reviews.title: Quick and Easy!
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer is so easy to use. With a push of a button you have a reading via forehead or inner ear. The forehead reader easily pops off to expose the ear piece. Both readings are fast and accurate. If you're running a fever there will be multiple beeps and it will turn Red. If your temperature is within normal range, it will beep once and turn green. An added bonus is that the carrying case and batteries are included. This unit is nice and compact. I love how easy it is to use, even my ten year olds were able to take each others temperatures. No more germs from the old school mouth thermometers.
customer_reviews.author: J. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Received this today and already very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Received this today and already very happy with it!! I love that you have the option between forehead or ear, with fidgety kids the two options will make this mom's life a little easier. And the fact that I don't have to keep up with two different thermometers will be a blessing! I have tried it on the kids and you get a consistent temp whether on the forehead or the in the ear. It's a great price compared to other brands also!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Cox

customer_reviews.title: Works well for me.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this thermometer to help with taking my daughter's temperature. Even though I have the quick read thermometers, she doesn't like holding it under her tongue and I often have to take it 2 or 3 times to make sure it's accurate. This works much better. I haven't used the ear part, as the forehead method seems to work fine. It's easy to use, quick and the temps seem accurate when double checking with an oral thermometer. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: FLattyFrog

customer_reviews.title: Instant temperature!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just absolutely so quick and easy to use, straight out of the box, pull the strip at the battery compartment and you're ready to go! It has two buttons for head and ear readings. With old head thermometers you had to swipe across foreheads or hold in place for a minute or more, with this one you just hold up to forehead or take the cap off and put it in the ear and press the button. That's it! Instant temperature! You can take the temperature of a sleeping baby and they will sleep through it.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa K.

customer_reviews.title: Complete inaccurate.  Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Completely inaccurate. I've used this device 3-4 times. Each time I confirmed the temp with an oral thermometer with up to a 3 degree discrepancy! (This unit showed 99.4 and her temp was 102.6). Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: DoctorNotSoStrange

customer_reviews.title: I love the ease of use and quick results that I ...
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer I bought to replace a standard oral one that took forever to get a reading. I love the ease of use and quick results that I get. My kids prefer me taking their temperature on their forehead vs their ear though. Definitely a worthwhile purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Smith

customer_reviews.title: This is a great thermometer especially with a toddler
customer_reviews.text: This is a great thermometer especially with a toddler! If your little is like mine he is super moody when he is not feeling good so trying to get his temperature with his ear can be huge task and I think he associates the ear with the dr. I love that this is a dual so you have the option of the forehead too. Highly recommend this! Great gift for new mommies so easy to use and quick!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I'm always losing my thermometers and having to run out AFTER the kids are sick so I decided to get a head start this year and get this thermometer when I saw it. Like anyone would do I took everyone's temp as soon as I opened it from the box, and THEN I found out you can take off the top and it has the ear thermometer too! Of course I hope I don't need it anytime soon but I'm glad I picked it up.
customer_reviews.author: Man

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed ...
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed. I was looking for a forehead thermometer. I was at the doctors with a fever of 103.0. Took my temp with this product and it stated 94.2. I tried several times. Each reading was inaccurate. >> returned <>
customer_reviews.author: DMoore

customer_reviews.title: Great item. Must have for any househould!
customer_reviews.text: A must have for any household especially with young children. Easily reads from forehead or ear. Ready to go again in seconds. One thing that would be nice is covers for when you use ear part. Or let you know if you can purchase separately, what will fit. Otherwise, this is one awesome thermometer!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love how simple and easy the AccuMD Infrared thermometer is to use. Press the Head or Ear button and it gives you the temperature readings in sec. Love the fact I can check the babies temp while they asleep.
customer_reviews.author: Maribel Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: It couldn't be any simpler to use. You either place on the lower forehead or pop off the top and place the tip 8n the ear and click once. Temo displays withing the second. Great for our toddler who does not want to sit still for us to take his temp.
customer_reviews.author: C. Christiano

customer_reviews.title: A very good product
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, and is accurate. The only fault is that it emits a tiny beep, and it scares our dog when you use the ear mode. So next time, I will use the forehead part on a place on her tummy where there is no fur.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and fast reading
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This is a great thermometer. It is accurate and fast. It only takes 1 second to get a reading. You can use it two ways, by forehead or eardrum. It is easy and comfortable to use. The thermometer is light weight. This thermometer is better than the old digital type under the tongue ones.
customer_reviews.author: pam foster

customer_reviews.title: Great thermometer!
customer_reviews.text: The AccuMD Thermometer is very easy to use with easy to understand instructions. It provides a quick reading of your temperature. The ear and head temperature were very close together, so both seem to be accurate. Great thermometer!
customer_reviews.author: HeatherO

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: WAY better than that popular exergen thermometer! Wish we had purchased this one first all along!
customer_reviews.author: Dayna Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Handy Little Thermometer
customer_reviews.text: I love this handy thermometer. It can be used with one hand and takes your temperature very quickly. It comes with a nice drawstring pouch to keep this item safe and in good wirking condition. With an infant in the house, this thermometer will come in extremely handy.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thermometer! It's so easy to use, and r works very well. I would definitely recommend. It's cheap too!
customer_reviews.author: Malaina Hicks

customer_reviews.title: not accurate.
customer_reviews.text: Not all that accurate. I compared it to a oral thermometer and it was way off.
customer_reviews.author: superman

customer_reviews.title: This thermometer works great. It reads super fast and is very accurate
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer works great. It reads super fast and is very accurate. I love that you can use it 2 ways as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tara J. Chumsae

customer_reviews.title: Great all around staple for every household.
customer_reviews.text: Quick easy to use and spot on for a sick child or adult. This thermometer is a must have staple in every house young and old. Great product with lighting fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Magee

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: This worked for a month or two. Now it’s reading a fever at 97 degrees or below. I used it on myself and while not sick I got a reading of 95.
customer_reviews.author: Julie B.

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: This is simple and to the point. Does exactly what it intends, is very user friendly and easy to use. A must have in ever home.
customer_reviews.author: ray moore

customer_reviews.title: Excellent thermometer!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent thermometer! Temperature was right on point and was simple and easy to use!!!! Would definitely recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Temperature
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed! Does both head and ear temperature, accurate, fast easy to use. highly recommended for anyone with babies and kids.
customer_reviews.author: Cherish Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Quick and easy and the kids do not cry while trying to get a temperature. The AccMD-Instant Infared thermometer is small for storage and comes with a cute bag. Recommend this buy especially if you have little ones!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: very easy to use and has been working fine
customer_reviews.text: Came on time, very easy to use and has been working fine.
customer_reviews.author: Steve C

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Glad I paid the extra amount for better quality! Works great :)
customer_reviews.author: Jessica peters

customer_reviews.title: This is great. You can pull the cap off and use ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great. You can pull the cap off and use it as an ear thermometer or leave the cap on for temporal. Unlike the last temporal thermometer I bought this one seems to be far more consistent only varying a couple tenths of a degree (a realistic margin of error for an external thermometer. I definitely would recommend this to a friend. It's also nice that it comes with a reusable bag to keep it clean since I store mine in the medicine cabinet so it seems likely to get liquid meds on it.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie/Kurt Stoddard

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate at all...
customer_reviews.text: We've had this thermometer for about 6 months and it pretty much just sits around and goes unused. The readings are all over the place whether we use the ear or head function it never seems to give an accurate or consistent temperature. Would NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RL

customer_reviews.title: This infrared thermometer is easy to use and easy to read
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have in a home. This infrared thermometer is easy to use and easy to read. Simply in just install batteries. I tested everyone in my household and it was accurate reading. I would recommend this thermometer.
customer_reviews.author: Lynell Roberson
